title: Riot you should let my teammates report me during the game
body:
And then you should let me leave the game immediately without penalty when they do. 

That way I won't have to put up with people raging in chat to x9 report me every game while they intentionally troll me and then blame anything that goes wrong as a result of their trolling on me. 

Since they've already decided to report me 3 minutes into the game, why make me still try to help them win the game? Doesn't make sense.

replies.body: that would encourage intentional trolling and feeding though.

I don't exactly agree nor disagree but I've seen a number of cases of such immature behavior.
People rage, threaten x9 reports, but then the flamed person goes afk - "why would I try, you are reporting me anyways?", and they suddenly change their mind and beg to continue playing.

I suffer from the "FUCK IT I'M DONE, wait nvm" Syndrome. Whenever I'm up with some overly toxic team mate or in some overly tilting position (Irelia/Yas/Whatever going 1v5 on us and winning and team refuses to surrender), I tend to simply let out a loud fuck it and leave the game. Only to go back to it 30 seconds later after thinking that losing my account wouldn't be fun.
